page.title: 10A SCHOOL COOK-UPTON,WIDNES
page.content: I am the cook in charge of dinners at {St. Basil's Junior School.}I cook all the meals,prepare and order the food. We prepare 85 meals per day,45 of them are free.The children's favourite food is curry and rice,salad is the least popular.I have had this job for 16 years.I enjoy my job especially on the days when the children eat all their dinner,but I need more helpers. {****** SAMPLE MENU FOR ONE WEEK ****** { MONDAY}Fruit juice.Hot dogs,baked beans,bread rolls. { TUESDAY}Chicken supreme.Egg custard. { WEDNESDAY}Roast beef,green beans, roast potatoes.1/2 fresh fruit. Biscuit and fruit squash. { THURSDAY}Sausage rolls.Salad.Potatoe crisps.Sponge cake & Custard.Water. { FRIDAY}Fish in batter.Mushy peas. Chips.Scones.Fruit squash. {Jenny Osterick Kathryn Froes
